title: SEND - Digital Notification Service
description: SEND is the platform that makes it faster, simpler and safer to send and receive legal communications

hero.title: Legal communications are digitalized
hero.subtitle: SEND is the platform that makes it faster, cheaper and safer to send and receive legal notices, simplifying the process for everyone: the entities that send them and the recipients that receive them.
hero.altText: Image of the SEND platform for Desktop and Mobile

enti.title: A more simple way for managing notifications
enti.description_1: SEND - Digital Notification Service relieves institutions from all the legal fulfillments related to the management of legal communications.
enti.description_2: All institutions have to do is file the document to be notified: the platform will then send it, digitally or analogically, which saves both time and costs for the entire process.
enti.altText: Preview of the Notifications page of the SEND platform on a notebook

cittadini.title: Notifications from public administrations at your fingertips
cittadini.description_1: Citizens can chose to receive and consult notifications digitally by logging into SEND via SPID or CIE or directly from the IO app.
cittadini.description_2: In any case, the platform provides the freedom of choice: recipients can always indicate to receive the communications according to their preferences.
cittadini.altText: One hand holds a smartphone. The screen shows the details of a notification.

imprese.title: Everything in one place
imprese.description: SEND provides a single shared space where different representatives of the same company can view and manage in a fully digitalized manner all the notifications received from the various institutions and pay any amounts due.
imprese.altText: A man and a woman sitting at a table, looking at a notebook
